text: Remember when Justin Bieber sang : ` ` I didn't want anyone thinking I still care – I don't – but, you still hit my phone up.'' And then when Selena Gomez said : ` ` Who's waking up to drive you home when you're drunk and all alone... It ain't me.'' Apparently they both lied to us, because Jelena is alive and active once more. The two recently reunited lovebirds were last seen at Justin's hockey game. Splash Selena arrived to the L. A. rink last night wearing all black under a denim jacket, then watched from the stands while her not - so - ex ex - boyfriend skated around the ice rink like the Canadian that he is.
